data.prayer: Jesus, teach the local leaders in Chimaltenango, Guatemala to be humble and to serve others.
data.verse: It shall not be so among you. But whoever would be great among you must be your servant, and whoever would be first among you must be your slave, even as the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve, and to give his life as a ransom for many.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chimaltenango, Guatemala

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Chimaltenango, Guatemala and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Chimaltenango, Guatemala.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, bless the state of Chimaltenango with a multiplying movement of house churches.
data.verse: ...but indeed, as I live, all the earth will be filled with the glory of the Lord.

data.prayer: Father, 0.0% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
Lord we pray you unite the 193,228 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Chimaltenango.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Chimaltenango, Guatemala.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chimaltenango, Guatemala has a population of 774,100.

We estimate Chimaltenango has 193,228 people who might know Jesus, 544,524 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 36,349 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 4 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, please send teachers of your Word in Chimaltenango who can speak your gospel boldly and clearly.
